data.title: Get Support for Your Mobile Home Community
data.meta_description: ROC USA supports mobile home communities by providing the necessary resources — connecting to financial institutions or starting a board.
data.text:
Technical

Assistance

Our support for ROCs doesn’t end when the ink dries on the purchase paperwork. Our network subject matter experts stay on for at least 10 years, guiding ROCs through all phases of resident ownership, including support in community operations, financial oversight, regulatory compliance and community development.

This holistic approach ensures residents have the expertise and resources needed for long-term stability, control and success in their communities.

Read our Organizing and Training Principles to learn more.

Network

Affiliates

ROC USA works with a network of regional Certified Technical Assistance Provider (CTAP) nonprofits across the country that support residents of manufactured home communities in becoming ROCs through comprehensive pre-purchase and post-purchase coaching, training and expertise.

Before the purchase, CTAP staff help secure financing, conduct due diligence, organize cooperative structures and provide training on governance and financial management. Our support also exists in financing with ROC USA Capital, peer-to-peer networking with ROC Association, and with extensive additional resources.
